alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 8:36AM EST until December 23 at 9:02PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New York NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Saddle River at Lodi. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM EST Friday was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by this afternoon and continue falling to 2.3 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.1 feet on 01/27/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Saddle River Lodi 5.5 5.6 Fri 8 am EST 2.8 2.4 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM EST.
